name: Karlson (itch) (STEN1)
description:
Entry for Valmuen 10h gamejam 2021

Karlson has to get all the candy before he gets home.

You can double jump.

When launched into the air, use a + smooth mouse movement to the left, or d + smooth mouse movement to the right to fly around buildings.

Mouse1 to T-Pose and show dominance :)

Programmer:

Sten

Artist:

Regine

Joachim
